climbs.name: The shoe is on the other foot

content.description:
Starts in the left-side of a south-facing cave. Climb left out of cave to west face, then back right to south face (above cave) under a roof to a ledge, then up the crack about 3 more meters.  Kind of like a backwards S rotated 90*, if that makes any sense. 

  Use your anchor to TR the sweet roof just right of this climb.  It's Ã¼ber fun, until you get to the BLANK face above, then it pretty much sucks.
content.protection: 4 bolts to gear anchor in flared, 3" crack. Use some 2' slings to get your 'biners out of the crack and reduce rope drag.

content.description:
East-facing. Directly across the "canyon" from Munchkinland. 

If this rock, or any routes on it, have already been named/climbed, please advise.
